Include.description: Related resources to include, comma separated (e.g. Company,Profile)
Include.name: include

Limit.description: Maximum number of records to return (default 25)
Limit.name: limit

Offset.description: Number of records to skip before starting to return results (default 0)
Offset.name: offset

Order.description: Sort order, comma separated with direction (e.g. name asc,created_at desc)
Order.name: order

Select.description: Fields to include in the response, comma separated (e.g. id,name,email)
Select.name: select

post.description: Creates a new Author Profile record

delete.description: Deletes multiple Author Profile records in a single request

requestBody.description: Array of Author Profile IDs to delete

post.description: Creates multiple Author Profile records in a single request

requestBody.description: Array of new Author Profile data

put.description: Updates multiple Author Profile records in a single request

parameters.description: ID of the Author Profile to delete
parameters.name: id

get.description: Retrieves a single Author Profile by its ID

parameters.description: ID of the Author Profile
parameters.name: id

put.description: Updates an existing Author Profile record

parameters.description: ID of the Author Profile to update
parameters.name: id

parameters.description: Filter by field value (e.g. name=John)
parameters.name: {field}

parameters.description: Filter where field equals value
parameters.name: {field}__eq

parameters.description: Filter where field does not equal value
parameters.name: {field}__ne

parameters.description: Filter where field is greater than value
parameters.name: {field}__gt

parameters.description: Filter where field is less than value
parameters.name: {field}__lt

parameters.description: Filter where field is greater than or equal to value
parameters.name: {field}__gte

parameters.description: Filter where field is less than or equal to value
parameters.name: {field}__lte

parameters.description: Filter where field matches pattern (SQL LIKE)
parameters.name: {field}__like

parameters.description: Filter where field matches pattern case insensitive (SQL ILIKE)
parameters.name: {field}__ilike

parameters.description: Filter where field matches all values (comma separated)
parameters.name: {field}__and

parameters.description: Filter where field matches any value (comma separated)
parameters.name: {field}__or
